titles: Ad clerum. A sermon preached at a visitation holden at Grantham in the county and diocess of Lincolne, 8. Octob. 1641. By a late learned prelate. Now published by his own copy.
author: Sanderson, Robert, 1587-1663.
publisher: printed by H. Hall printer to the university for Ric. Davis,
notes: With initial imprimatur leaf and final blank leaf.
A late learned prelate = Robert Sanderson.--Wing (CD-ROM edition).
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
